show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

header.title: Why Women Don’t Run for Office

title: Why Women Don’t Run for Office
content: Eleanor LeCain talks about why women still only hold 20% of elected offices and what we can do about it  with Dr. <!--more--> Jennifer Lawless, professor of government at American University and author of It Still Takes a Candidate: Why Women Don’t Run for Office.
